CustomField.description: This field shows when the related appointment are supposed to start. To be used for sorting threads in lists.
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(HOT_WageClaim__c)), HOT_WageClaim__r.StartTime__c, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(HOT_ServiceAppointment__c)), HOT_ServiceAppointment__r.EarliestStartTime, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(HOT_Request__c)), HOT_Request__r.StartTime__c, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(HOT_WorkOrder__c)), HOT_WorkOrder__r.StartDate, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(HOT_InterestedResource__c)), HOT_InterestedResource__r.ServiceAppointmentStartTime__c, NULL ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: AppointmentStartTime
